00033 class KviDns;
00034 class KviWindow;

00036 class KviKvsVariantList;

00038 class KviKvsDnsObject
00039 {
00040 public:
00041         KviKvsDnsObject(KviDns * pDns,
00042                                 KviWindow * pWnd,
00043                                 const QString &szQuery,
00044                                 bool bRebindOnWindowClose = true,
00045                                 KviKvsScript * pCallback = 0,
00046                                 KviKvsVariantList * pParameterList = 0);
00047         ~KviKvsDnsObject();
00048 protected:
00049         KviDns                    * m_pDns;
00050         KviWindow                 * m_pWindow;
00051         QString                     m_szQuery;
00052         KviKvsScript              * m_pCallback;        // callback to be executed when the dns terminates
00053         KviKvsVariantList         * m_pParameterList;   // parameter list (magic)
00054         bool                        m_bRebindOnWindowClose; // should we trigger the callback even if m_pWindow no longer exists ?
00055 public:
00056         KviDns * dns(){ return m_pDns; };
00057         KviWindow * window(){ return m_pWindow; };
00058         KviKvsScript * callback(){ return m_pCallback; };
00059         KviKvsVariantList * parameterList(){ return m_pParameterList; };
00060         const QString & query() const { return m_szQuery; };
00061         bool rebindOnWindowClose() const { return m_bRebindOnWindowClose; };
00062         void setWindow(KviWindow * pWnd){ m_pWindow = pWnd; };
00063         void setParameterList(KviKvsVariantList * pList){ m_pParameterList = pList; };
00064 };
